content.heroIntro: VISTA AZUL XXXV represents an exceptional opportunity to own a contemporary villa in one of Costa Blanca's most sought-after locations. Developed by NAVASAEZ, a trusted name in Spanish real estate, this exclusive collection of 3-bedroom villas combines modern architecture with the prestigious Lo Romero Golf setting in Pilar de La Horadada. With prices starting from €484,900 and scheduled completion on March 1st, 2026, VISTA AZUL XXXV offers intelligent investment potential in a region experiencing consistent 8% year-on-year growth. The town's authentic Spanish character remains intact while catering perfectly to international residents. With multiple Blue Flag beaches just 20 minutes away and a regional hospital within 30 minutes, Lo Romero Golf offers comprehensive lifestyle infrastructure rarely found in such an intimate setting.

faqs.question: What are the costs of buying property in Spain?
faqs.answer: Additional costs typically include: Transfer tax (6-10%), notary fees (0.5-1%), registry fees (0.1%), and legal fees (1-2%). faqs.question: Can foreigners buy property in Spain?
faqs.answer: Yes, foreign buyers can purchase Spanish property. There are no restrictions for EU citizens. Non-EU citizens may have residency requirements in some regions, though most can purchase freely. Spanish banks offer mortgages to qualified international buyers. Our legal team handles all documentation to ensure smooth international transactions.

faqs.question: Do I need a visa to buy property in Spain?
faqs.answer: No visa is required specifically to purchase property in Spain. However, EU citizens enjoy freedom of movement and residence. Non-EU buyers can purchase property and may qualify for a non-lucrative visa based on financial capacity. Many VISTA AZUL XXXV buyers obtain residency through property investment programs or retirement schemes.
